column4: SO, to make a new directory it would -  sudo mkdir -p /usr/chroot/ubuntu-32-intrepid
Does anyone have a faster, easier, N00B, proof way of installing the netbean 6.5 .sh files off the netbeans website?
Im sorry I don't want to sound like a parrout but, is this the right way to make folder.  sudo mkdir -p /usr/chroot/ubuntu-32-intrepid
you guys are nice here..good stuff
also, you'll have to restart running programs for them to use the new font
but apt-get is the one officially supported and used.
